title: Levtex Home - Lyon Teal - Window Panels with Rod Pocket - Two Curtains 84 inch Length - Bird Toile - Teal, Taupe, Cream, Brown - 100% Cotton - Lined
features: THE LYON TEAL DESIGN: One of our most popular collections, Lyon Teal is inspired by traditional French toiles. It is the perfect accessory for any bedroom, family room, living room or den.
CONVENIENT LUXURY: Made from 100% Cotton, the Lyon Teal drape panels are easy to care for. Two 84 inch long drape panels included in purchase (55 inches wide).

COORDINATE YOUR HOME: Create a wonderful space with our coordinated Lyon Teal Collection. The design is versatile and will match a variety of different looks. You can also freshen your room with other items from the Levtex Home Collection.

description: LEVTEX HOME LYON TEAL COLLECTION: The Lyon Teal curtain two panel set complements the Lyon Teal bedding collection but can be used to accessorize any window in your home. These window panels feature a beautiful traditional toile featuring flowers and birds in shades of taupe and brown on a rich teal ground and will complement so many design choices.
